name: 佩格·奥基夫

last_movies.title: 末日巡逻队 第三季

introduction: Peg has accomplished a rare feat for any working actor by simultaneously streaming in three mega-franchise universes: Marvel (She Hulk), DC (Doom Patrol), and PlayStation (Twisted Metal). Yes, there is a game piece molded in her likeness. Trained in modern classics-Albee, Beckett, Williams, Didion-and with decades of performance, writing, and teaching under her belt, this saucy granny delivers physical comedy or gritty realism on demand.
